title: When Breath Becomes Air
author: Paul Kalanithi
summary: The memoir of Paul Kalanithi, a neurosurgeon at Stanford University, who is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer in his mid-thirties.

title: Manual for Living
author: Epictetus
summary: Some things are in your power and some are not—do not confuse the two and do not desire the things that are not in your power.

title: Meditations
author: Marcus Aurelius
summary: One of the world's most famous and influential books, Meditations, by the Roman emperor Marcus Aurelius (A.D. 121–180).

title: Fooled by Randomness
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
summary: Randomness, chance, and luck influence our lives and our work more than we realize.

title: What Got You Here Won’t Get You There
author: Marshall Goldsmith
summary: Behavioral problems, not technical skills, are what separate the great from the near great.

title: Not Fade Away
author: Laurence Shames and Peter Barton
summary: It is more important to live fully than to live in a straight line. The surest gauge of the impact a life makes is how many other lives it touches.

title: The Last Song
author: Nicholas Sparks
summary: A 17yrs old Veronica 'Ronnie' Miller's life was turned upside down when her parents divorced and her father Moved from NY.

title: The Lucky One
author: Nicholas Sparks
summary: While in Iraq, U.S. Marine Logan Thibault finds a photo, half-buried in the dirt, of a woman.
